question: Which of the following statements about Fundamental Duties contained in Part IVA is incorrect?
option1: Fundamental duties are not justiciable in nature
option2: Fundamental duties were incorporated in the constitution on recommendation of Swaran Singh Committee
option3: Fundamental duties are applicable only to citizens and not to foreigners
option4: Fundamental duties were added to Indian Constitution by 44th amendment act
answer: Fundamental duties were added to Indian Constitution by 44th amendment act
explanation: Fourth statement is incorrect because fundamental duties were added to Indian Constitution by 42nd Constitutional Amendment Act (1976).
